data.description_html: This spell renders up to three deathless creatures immobile. If the spell is successful, it renders the deathless paralyzed for the duration of the spell (similar to the effect of hold person on a living creature). The effect is broken if the halted creatures are attacked or take damage.
data.name: Halt Deathless
data.target: Up to three deathless, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
